alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:14PM CDT until May 12 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 414 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Mendenhall to Rockport, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mendenhall, D`Lo, Puckett, Georgetown, Braxton, Pinola, Martinville, Hopewell, Rockport, Harrisville and Union. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
